oai_dc:dc.dc:title: City Attorney Letter Advising Against March
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Memphis Police Department; Holloman, Frank; protests;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from City Attorney James M. Manire to Louis R. Lucas and Walter L. Bailey, Jr. advising against the proposed plans for the Black Monday protests.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Manire, James M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript Collection processed by Wayne Dowdy
